info.name: Documentation API Service
info.description:
Postman collection for Lambda Documentation API Service deployed on AWS API Gateway.

**Base URL**: {{base_url}}
**Production URL**: https://94hucnirj2.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com

**Authentication**:
- Public endpoints: No authentication required (most endpoints are public)
- Access control handled at data model level via access_control fields

## API Structure

### REST API v1
- **Health Check**: Service health and info endpoints (2 endpoints)
- **Pages API** (`/api/v1/pages/`): 30+ endpoints - Full CRUD, category filtering (by type, by user type), format/import/analyse, statistics
- **Endpoints API** (`/api/v1/endpoints/`): 28+ endpoints - Full CRUD, category filtering, format/import/analyse
- **Relationships API** (`/api/v1/relationships/`): 30+ endpoints - Full CRUD, category filtering, format/import/analyse, statistics
- **Postman API** (`/api/v1/postman/`): 8+ endpoints - Configuration CRUD, format/import/analyse, statistics
- **Index Management API** (`/api/v1/index/`): 12 endpoints - Read/rebuild/validate indexes for all resources

**Total**: 100+ endpoints

## Features
- **JSON Ingestion**: `/format/` endpoints return copy/paste examples, `/import/` accepts JSON payloads for upsert operations
- **Analysis Integration**: `/analyse/` endpoints ingest analysis JSON from frontend/backend tools and sync into S3
- **Index Management**: Read, rebuild, and validate index.json files for fast INDEX-ONLY responses
- **S3 JSON storage**: All data (metadata and content) stored in JSON files
- **Content included directly**: No presigned URLs needed - content in JSON responses
- **Category filtering**: By type, user type (access control), version, method, usage type, usage context, state
- **Statistics endpoints**: Index-based aggregated statistics for fast responses
- **Partial updates (PATCH)**: Recursive merge for nested objects
- **Graceful error handling**: Statistics endpoints return empty defaults on errors

## New Endpoints (v2)

### Format Endpoints
- `GET /api/v1/{resource}/format/` - Returns JSON examples, S3 key conventions, and analysis payload formats

### Import Endpoints
- `POST /api/v1/{resource}/import/?mode=upsert|create_only|update_only` - Accepts JSON payloads (single item, list, or wrapper object) and upserts to S3 with index updates

### Analyse Endpoints
- `POST /api/v1/{resource}/analyse/` - Ingests analysis JSON from tools and syncs into S3 using existing sync_from_analysis methods

### Index Management
- `GET /api/v1/index/{resource}/` - Read index.json
- `POST /api/v1/index/{resource}/rebuild/` - Rebuild index from S3 files
- `GET /api/v1/index/{resource}/validate/` - Validate index consistency

## Route Ordering Note

The API is built with FastAPI. Specific routes (like `/format/`, `/import/`, `/statistics/`) are defined BEFORE parameterized routes (`/{id}/`) to prevent route conflicts.

item.name: Health Check

request.description: Check service health and MongoDB connection status. Returns cached health status immediately (<5ms) and refreshes in background if stale.
Get service information (name, version, status). No authentication required.

item.description: Health check and service info endpoints (no authentication required)

item.name: REST API v1 - Pages
Base CRUD

request.description: List all documentation pages with filters and pagination.
Create new documentation page. Requires API key.
Get documentation page by ID. Content is included directly in the JSON response.

response.name: Success - Get Page
response.body:
{
  "_id": "about-page-001",
  "page_id": "about_page",
  "page_type": "docs",
  "metadata": {
    "route": "/about",
    "file_path": "app/about/page.tsx",
    "purpose": "About page",
    "s3_key": "data/pages/about_page.json",
    "status": "published",
    "authentication": "Not required",
    "last_updated": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000000+00:00",
    "uses_endpoints": [],
    "ui_components": [],
    "endpoint_count": 0,
    "api_versions": []
  },
  "content": "# About\n\nThis is the about page content in markdown format.",
  "created_at": "2024-01-01T00:00:00.000000+00:00"
}

request.description: Full update documentation page. Requires API key.
Partial update documentation page. Only provided fields are updated. Requires API key.
Delete documentation page. Default is soft delete. Requires API key.

item.name: Category - By Type

request.description: List all docs pages.
List all marketing pages.
List all dashboard pages.
Get count of pages by type. Requires API key.
List all page types with counts. Requires API key.
List published pages by type.
List draft pages by type.
Get statistics for a specific page type. Requires API key.

item.description: Category endpoints filtered by page type

item.name: Category - By User Type

request.description: List pages accessible by super_admin users. Filters pages based on access_control.can_view for super_admin. Only returns pages where super_admin has can_view=True.
List pages accessible by admin users. Filters pages based on access_control.can_view for admin. Only returns pages where admin has can_view=True.
List pages accessible by pro_user users. Filters pages based on access_control.can_view for pro_user. Only returns pages where pro_user has can_view=True.
List pages accessible by free_user users. Filters pages based on access_control.can_view for free_user. Only returns pages where free_user has can_view=True.
List pages accessible by guest users. Filters pages based on access_control.can_view for guest. Only returns pages where guest has can_view=True.

variable.description: User type: super_admin, admin, pro_user, free_user, guest

request.description: List pages accessible by a specific user type. Path parameter: user_type (super_admin, admin, pro_user, free_user, guest). Filters pages based on access_control.can_view for the specified user type. Supports additional filters: page_type, include_drafts, include_deleted, status.

item.description: Category endpoints filtered by user type (access control). Returns only pages where the specified user type has can_view=True in access_control.

item.name: Custom Actions

request.description: Publish a draft page. Sets status to 'published'. Requires API key.
Unpublish a published page. Sets status to 'draft'. Requires API key.
Sync page to Lambda (placeholder for Django integration). Requires API key.
Sync page to S3 (placeholder for Django integration). Requires API key.

item.description: Custom action endpoints for pages

request.description: Get copy/paste JSON examples and S3 key conventions for pages. Returns minimal required fields, example payloads, and analysis payload format. No authentication required.

item.name: Import & Upsert

request.description: Import/upsert pages from JSON payload. Accepts single page object, list of pages, or {"pages": [...]}. Mode: upsert (default), create_only, update_only. Returns statistics: total, created, updated, errors.

query.description: Only create new pages, fail if exists

request.description: Import pages in create-only mode. Fails if any page already exists.

item.description: Import/upsert endpoints accept JSON payloads and write to S3 with index updates

item.name: Analyse & Sync

request.description: Ingest frontend analysis JSON and sync pages into S3. Accepts {"pages": [...]} or list of page analysis entries. Calls sync_from_analysis internally.

item.description: Analyse endpoints ingest analysis JSON from frontend tools and sync into S3

item.name: Statistics

request.description: Get overall pages statistics from the pages index (index-only). Returns total, version, last_updated, statistics, and indexes. Fast response using pre-calculated index data.

item.description: Statistics endpoints return index-based aggregated data

Import relationships in by-page format. Service automatically flattens and creates bidirectional relationships.

item.name: REST API v1 - Index Management
Pages Index

request.description: Read current pages index.json from S3. Returns version, last_updated, total, pages list, indexes, and statistics. Cached for 60 seconds.
Rebuild pages index from all page files in S3. Scans data/pages/*.json and rebuilds data/pages/index.json with full page data for INDEX-ONLY responses. Returns 202 Accepted with rebuild status.

Validate pages index consistency. Checks that all page files in S3 are listed in index, and that index doesn't reference non-existent files. Returns validation report with missing_in_index and extra_in_index lists.

item.description: Pages index management: read, rebuild, and validate

item.name: Endpoints Index

request.description: Read current endpoints index.json from S3. Returns version, last_updated, total, endpoints list, indexes (by_api_version, by_method, by_path_method, by_endpoint_state, by_lambda_service), and statistics. Cached for 60 seconds.

Rebuild endpoints index from all endpoint files in S3. Scans data/endpoints/*.json and rebuilds data/endpoints/index.json with full endpoint data for INDEX-ONLY responses. Returns 202 Accepted with rebuild status.

Validate endpoints index consistency. Checks that all endpoint files in S3 are listed in index, validates by_path_method mapping correctness. Returns validation report with missing_in_index, extra_in_index, and by_path_method_mismatches.

item.description: Endpoints index management: read, rebuild, and validate

item.name: Relationships Index

request.description: Read current relationships index.json from S3. Returns version, last_updated, total, relationships list, indexes (by_page, by_endpoint, by_usage_type, by_usage_context, by_state, etc.), and statistics. Cached for 60 seconds.

Rebuild relationships index from all relationship files in S3. Scans data/relationships/by-page/*.json and rebuilds data/relationships/index.json with full relationship data for INDEX-ONLY responses. Returns 202 Accepted with rebuild status.

Validate relationships index consistency. Checks that relationships derived from by-page files match relationships listed in index, validates presence of expected by-page and by-endpoint files. Returns validation report with missing_in_index, extra_in_index, missing_by_endpoint_files, and missing_by_page_files.

item.description: Relationships index management: read, rebuild, and validate

item.name: Postman Index

request.description: Read current Postman index.json from S3. Returns configurations list, total, updated_at. Cached for 60 seconds.

Rebuild Postman index.json and by-state indexes from configuration objects. Scans data/postman/configurations/*.json and rebuilds data/postman/index.json and data/postman/by-state/{state}.json files. Returns 202 Accepted with rebuild status including states breakdown.

Validate Postman index consistency. Checks that all configuration files in S3 are listed in index, and that index doesn't reference non-existent files. Returns validation report with missing_in_index and extra_in_index lists.

item.description: Postman index management: read, rebuild, and validate

REST API v1 - Index Management API: Read, rebuild, and validate index.json files for all resources (pages, endpoints, relationships, postman). Indexes enable fast INDEX-ONLY list responses without reading individual files.

variable.description: Base URL for the API Gateway endpoint
